resources.string: Run the Spotify app if you don\t start jammin\' upon launching this app, to authorize this app to have access to your Spotify app so that it can actually play Music. Spotify must be installed and you must logged in to either A free or paid account. You can revoke this apps\' access to your Spotify account by going https://spotify.com/account/apps/ and clicking remove access for the \"Play CrazyJ36 on Spotify - Android\" entry.
